F3_S0_Q_CAPABILITY_CONTEXT.title: Capability Context
F3_S0_Q_CAPABILITY_CONTEXT.question: Is the System Under Test a new capability for the fleet which is not replacing an existing less capable capability?

F3_S0_INFO_NEW_CAPABILITY.title: New Capability
F3_S0_INFO_NEW_CAPABILITY.body: The System Under Test is a new capability for the fleet and is not replacing an existing less capable capability.

F3_S0_INFO_IMPROVED_CAPABILITY.title: Improved Capability
F3_S0_INFO_IMPROVED_CAPABILITY.body: The system under test is a new capability which is replacing or improving a capability that already exists in the fleet.

F3_S1_Q_MISSION_CANNOT_EXECUTE.title: Mission Cannot Be Executed
F3_S1_Q_MISSION_CANNOT_EXECUTE.question: The mission cannot be executed or the mission must be aborted before reaching successful conclusion.

F3_S1_Q_REQUIRES_WORKAROUND.title: Workaround Required
F3_S1_Q_REQUIRES_WORKAROUND.question: The mission can be executed, but requires a workaround to ensure its successful conclusion.

F3_S1_Q_MISSION_TAKES_LONGER.title: Mission Takes Longer Than Planned
F3_S1_Q_MISSION_TAKES_LONGER.question: The mission can be executed, but expected mission completion time is delayed.

F3_S1_Q_PLANNING_DELAY_START_DELAY.title: Planning Delay With Start Delay
F3_S1_Q_PLANNING_DELAY_START_DELAY.question: Planning for the mission is delayed causing a delay in mission execution, but the mission can be successfully completed.

F3_S1_Q_PLANNING_DELAY_NO_START_DELAY.title: Planning Delay Without Start Delay
F3_S1_Q_PLANNING_DELAY_NO_START_DELAY.question: Planning for the mission is delayed, but the mission can be executed on time, and reach its successful conclusion.

F3_S2_ENTRY_PLACEHOLDER.title: Step 2 Entry (Placeholder)
F3_S2_ENTRY_PLACEHOLDER.body: Step 2 (Mission / Utilization Criticality Determination) will be inserted here next. This placeholder prevents orphan targets during incremental build-out.

F3_END_STEP1_ONLY.title: Outcome: Step 1 Complete (Placeholder)
F3_END_STEP1_ONLY.body: Step 1 impact classification is complete. Step 2 will determine the initial deficiency severity rating.
